body.name: Fluest Queen Bed Frame with Headboard and Footboard, with Under Bed Storage, All-Metal Support System, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly,Rustic Brown

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【All-Metal Support】The bed frame build with an all-metal support system, which is stable and durable. We have replaced weak planks with 13 metal slats and 9 metal legs increase the stability of the bed frame at the same time, so it can easily support up to 800lbs.

【Extra Storage Space】12.2 inches under-bed storage space of this metal bed frame can greatly improve the utilization of bedroom space, facilitate better storage of items for you, and make your bedroom look clean and tidy at the same time.

【Noise-Free Design】In order to ensure your sleep quality, we specially added a foam padding to the middle beam to avoid the friction between the metal components. This design is aimed to prevent noise interference when you relaxing or sleeping in bed.

【Industrial Appearance】The whole headboard is design to be unique and innovative and consists of three boards.The vintage brown industrial headboard and footboard are waterproof and scratch-resistant, which is not only simple and modern, but also practical and solid.

【Easily Assemble】For your convenience to install, we simplify the installation of the support system and provide detailed assembly instruction. And each part will be labeled with a serial number.It just takes you less than 60 minutes to finish the entire installation process.
【Warm Reminder】To save your time and get suitable items, please kindly have a check of your space size and the expected bed size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, easy set up
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, looks good, easy to assemble. The only mix up is that in one picture in the instructions you assemble 3 slats across the frame with 6 screws but the instructions say 4. Obvious typo. The company provides extra screws and this part had 7 so 6 were definitely required. It was screw type M in case you run into the same issue. Otherwise I was done in about 45 minutes. Very easy, and everything aligned perfectly. Tried to add photo but Amazon says settings don't allow it even though my settings do allow it....another glitch. No worries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to build
reviews.reviewText: I built this entirely on my own- took a bit over an hour because I was distracted. If you have two people it’ll take 45 min at most- the most tedious part are the first 2 steps when you have to screw 24 screws. It’s very easy to build, instructions are clear, everything you need is provided for you. Keep in mind this is a budget bedframe so the frame itself looks just ok, but the headboard makes it looks better. It gets the job done for a guest room or temporary living- works better than the floor haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great! But slides too much on hard floor.
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame was super easy to build, and it looks fantastic! The space underneath is perfect for storing all of my boxes. The only thing to watch out for is if you have a very smooth hard floor. This bed frame will slide a lot while you're sleeping, especially if you turn around constantly. But adding some rubber feet to the bottom of the bed made the problem non-existent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the price
reviews.reviewText: The bed frame was very easy to put together and actually looks nicer in person then in the picture. Would definitely recommend this bed frame to anyone. Also, offer good support for the mattress without having a box spring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter and I put this bed together. It was easy and as long as you tighten up the screws you have a good bed to sleep on. For the low price, this was definitely worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and simple
reviews.reviewText: The package was a rather small box … I thought… how is my entire bed frame in that… but it was… the directions were so simple, the hardware is labeled based on where it goes … and the finished result is heavy duty and stylish … I couldn’t be happier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, works well. Foam installation step confusing
reviews.reviewText: As the title said this was pretty quick and easy to install. About an hour and it feels sturdy. My one qualm is the instructions for the foam liner is confusing so the bed is still a little squeaky occasionally, but overall not bad for the cost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got one of these for myself, and one for my daughter. It took me and her about an hour per bed to put together. It was easy, we just had a toddler running around, or it would have been faster! Both bedframes are queen size, sturdy, and we love them!
